description: Perl test failures: Undefined subroutine reference in YAML::PP::Representer, missing test plan declaration, and 1/2 subtests failed with exit status 255.
CMake configuration failure: Requires update of cmake_minimum_required version as compatibility with CMake <3.5 has been removed.
Dependency resolution failure: plasma5-breeze-devel package not found, preventing installation candidate resolution.
Build failure: Missing critical Python package metadata directory /usr/lib/python3/site-packages/Plots-0.8.5.dist-info during RPM packaging.
C compilation error: Incompatible pointer type assignment in i_main.c (const char* const* vs char**) triggering -Wincompatible-pointer-types.
Configuration error: libELF library incompatibility detected during configure, specifically with Elf64_Sxword conversions (patches required for libelf-0.7.0).
C compilation error: Implicit int return type in main() function triggering -Wimplicit-int warnings, failing build process.
C structure error: Invalid access to __jmpbuf members (__pc and __sp) in pth_mctx.c, causing struct/union type mismatch during compilation.
Python test failures: Missing FlowWidget attribute in urwid dependency causing import errors in test modules (test_make_canvas.py, test_var_view.py).
